fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 123.01 lakh crore compared with Rs 381.64 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 surged 279.05 points or 1.63% to settle at 17,359.75. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, slumped 5.08% to 12.94. Reliance Industries (RIL), ICICI Bank and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The April 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 April 2023.
